projects.name: Gestura
projects.description: Gestura is a smart presentation control system utilizing Python, OpenCV (cv2), and other libraries to detect hand gestures for seamless slide navigation, enabling wireless and intuitive control during presentations.

projects.name: ToDoList
projects.description: A basic to-do list app that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks. It includes features like task categorization, due dates, and a simple interface for managing daily tasks.

projects.name: MediTrack
projects.description: MediTrack is a health management app that leverages machine learning to predict potential health issues based on user input and historical data. Developed with Python and Flask, it offers personalized health advice and tracking features for diet, exercise, and medication adherence.

projects.name: NewsFusion
projects.description: NewsFusion is a cross-platform news app developed using ReactJS, TailwindCSS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It aggregates and delivers top news from multiple platforms, providing users with a seamless and unified news-reading experience. The app offers a responsive design, ensuring smooth performance across both web and mobile devices.

projects.name: Glucoguard
projects.description: Glucoguard is a diabetes prediction system developed using machine learning, leveraging the Random Forest algorithm for accurate predictions. The model analyzes key health metrics to assess the likelihood of diabetes, helping users and healthcare professionals make informed decisions for early intervention and management of the condition.

projects.name: WeatherApp
projects.description: A weather application that fetches and displays current weather data based on the users location or input city. It uses a weather API and features a clean UI with temperature, conditions, and forecasts.
